summary: Two homilies originally occupied twelve leaves, of which two survived the fire of 1731. The manuscript is copied in one hand, s. ximed. Interlinear glosses in the Tremulous Hand, and probably at Worcester by the beginning of the s. xiii (Ker 1957, p. 229).
admin: Described by Owen Roberson with the assistance of Johanna Green, with reference to published scholarship; ed. by Takako Kato (2010; 2013)
